title: The new Patch
body:
Updater got stuck at 166 out of 170 tried to restart it now it is sayint there was a problem patching and it will restore to an older version then after it says it has restored it will try and patch but there was a problem and it loops like that and now it just gave me the launcher with an updater at the top left
This happens every other update. What is this and why I don't know but would take any input as to why it happens

replies.body: Exiting the patcher while it's trying to update game files caused some corruption within those files just like stopping any install/patch tends to do. It's best to leave the patcher to do it's thing unless you notice that it takes an obscenely long time and isn't actually working. If that happens again, make sure you disable any firewalls during the patch, and always launch the client as admin.
